mapper.select: SELECT system_user.userId, system_user.userName, system_user.userPwd, system_role.roleName AS `level`, system_user.realName FROM system_user INNER JOIN system_user_role ON system_user.userId = system_user_role.userId INNER JOIN system_role ON system_user_role.roleId = system_role.roleId WHERE system_user.userName = #{userName} AND system_user.userPwd = #{userPwd}

SELECT system_user.userId, system_user.userName, system_user.userPwd, system_role.roleName, system_user.realName FROM system_user INNER JOIN system_user_role ON system_user.userId = system_user_role.userId INNER JOIN system_role ON system_user_role.roleId = system_role.roleId WHERE system_user.isDeleted = 0 limit #{index},#{size}
